name: Revolut Business
description: Get invoices from your Revolut Business subscription.

forEach.script:
fetch(
  'https://business.revolut.com/api/subscriptions/invoice?from={{billingHistory.from}}',
  {
    headers: {
      accept: 'application/json, text/plain, */*',
      'x-device-id': '{{revoDeviceId}}',
      'x-timezone': 'Europe/Vienna',
    },
    referrer: 'https://business.revolut.com/',
    referrerPolicy: 'origin',
    body: null,
    method: 'GET',
    mode: 'cors',
    credentials: 'include',
  },
)
  .then((r) => r.text())
  .then((r) => r.match(/<span>#(\d+)<\/span>/)[1]) // extract invoiceId
